alert.note: Alert for Moses Lake Area; Spokane Area; Upper Columbia Basin; Washington Palouse; Waterville Plateau (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 14 at 9:47PM PST until January 15 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Quincy, Winchester, Waterville, Ephrata, Odessa, Ralston, Mansfield, Lamona, Othello, Moses Lake, Coulee City, Wilbur, Electric City, La Crosse, Harrington, Airway Heights, Davenport, Grand Coulee, Creston, Stratford, Palisades, Ritzville, and Coulee Dam. * WHEN...Until Noon PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. Conditions may change rapidly. Slick conditions are likely with below freezing temperatures.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Moses Lake Area; Spokane Area; Upper Columbia Basin; Washington Palouse; Waterville Plateau
